subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: One of the worst-kept secrets in soccer is that Freddy Adu has his heart set on playing in Europe. If it is up to Real Salt Lake owner Dave Checketts, that day will not come soon.
snippet: One of the worst-kept secrets in soccer is that Freddy Adu has his heart set on playing in Europe. If it is up to Real Salt Lake owner Dave Checketts, that day will not come soon.
